siteConstruction.text: This is my ReactJS resume website I deployed on AWS using GraphQL (this part is still in process) for the database. I built this by beginning with the Ceevee template by Styleshout http://www.styleshout.com/ and breaking up their template into isolated React components. Data is fed directly from a JSON File. My goal of building this website was to gain experience using ReactJS and AWS. I will be taking the AWS Cloud Practitioner certification exam in May 2022.
